docs.title: Dance Docs
docs.text: General info for ballroom and Latin dancing

docs.title: ECS Bronze 1-5
docs.text:
• basic
  • turning basic right
  • turning basic left
  • throw out
  • inside underarm turn

docs.title: ECS Bronze 6-10
docs.text:
• underarm release from basic
  • free-spin tuck-in from handshake
  • free-spin tuck-in from double handhold
  • underarm tuck-in from double handhold
  • alternating underarm turn
  • shoulder check
  • cradle

docs.title: ECS Bronze 11-15
docs.text:
• cradle to hammer-lock
  • sugar-push throw out
  • double face loop
  • opposition break and roll out
  • whirlpool

docs.title: Foxtrot 1-7
docs.text:
• feather step
  • reverse turn
  • feather finish
  • hover telemark
  • natural fallaway
  • outside swivel
  • basic weave

docs.title: Foxtrot 8-15
docs.text:
• fallaway slip pivot
  • change of direction
  • three step
  • natural turn
  • back feather
  • curving reverse wave
  • viennese cross with reverse pivot
  • contra check

docs.title: Hustle Bronze 1-7
docs.text:
• hesitation
  • wheel
  • underarm turn combination (follow/lead/follow)
  • leader's behind the back pass
  • follower's bridge with return
  • cross-body lead
  • cross-body lean to open break with return
  • face loop
  • two hand hold
  • double hand hold bridges

docs.title: Hustle Bronze 8-15
docs.text:
• the whip
  • cradle with continuous left
  • cradle in and out
  • back spot turn
  • grapevine
  • sliding doors
  • cross body lead with inside turn
  • shadow with comb / shadow with free spin
  • new york walk
